concept.title: Configuring Expressions and Conditions
concept.shortdesc: Use the expression language to configure expressions and conditions. You can configure expressions in the Expression Evaluator. You can configure conditions in the Stream Selector.

conbody.p:
You can use the following elements in an expression or condition:
Field names
Constants
Literals
Operators
Functions
For details about literals, operators, functions, and reserved words, see .
